Plastic Crusher Design

August 24, 2015

Overview

Designed a plastic crusher for office according to Creo and gave loading analysis to varies structures with ANSYS

Premilinary Conceptual Design

Basically cubic

Size: 13 in * 11.5 in * (15+3.5) in lengthwidth(body height + cover height)

Top block: avoid contact between cutters and human

Side block: avoid plastic pieces splash out and damage gears

Net: allow small pieces pass thought and block big pieces

Thickness of block

0.75 inches for front and back block

0.5 inches for left and right

Static and Dynamic Analysis

Cutter Analysis

Outer ring:

60o to reduce the pressure on the blade

0.58 in. thick, 1 ft. for total 20 element ( cutter-block-cutterâ€¦ )

Outer diameter 1.75 inches

Enough fillet for reducing the stress concentration

Inner ring:

Side length: 0.72 (shaft diameter 1.25)

Press fit

Material: ASTM A108 Cold Drawn
